rule: If the given word's part of speech can be determined and aligns with one of the part-of-speech tags in the alphabetical list provided, the output must be exactly one of those part-of-speech tags written in uppercase without any additional characters, spaces, or punctuation.
input: sentence: These apples are very fresh., word: fresh
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single part-of-speech tag, "JJ", which is present in the list of allowed tags in the description. No rules are violated as it follows the description's instruction to return only the tag and the tag is valid.
